name: Money Management Simulator
description:
Some people are born rich, some are born wise, but many are born ordinary.Their lives Start with nothing.

This game you will play an ordinary person, no inheritance, no high salary, you can only manage your money to make life better.

Game Features:
  -  Four different ways to invest and manage money.
  -  Over 20 random events.
  -  Every time you play a different stock move.
  -  With complete statistics, you will know your financial ability when you finish the game.

How to Play:
  -  "NEXT" Butoon to pass time.
  -  Spend money on deposits, funds, stocks or insurance.
  -  You can adjust your monthly consumption or agree to requests to increase your happiness.
  -  When you're 50 years old , you'll retire and take stock of your financial results.

Change your life by managing your money.

ps: happiness system is unfinished.
